name: Just dodge (zeu31)
description:
Move your spaceship left and right on the screen to dodge the asteroids and to collect energy orbs.

Controls:
- A and D (or left and right arrow) to move left and right.

Made for Ludum Dare 39, theme: "Running out of Power".

Made in Unity3D. Sprites done in Paint.net. Sounds done in Bfxr.
